subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Vols expressed concern about the reported activities of its student hostesses as the N.C.A.A.’s review of the recruiting practices of the university’s football program continued.
snippet: The Vols expressed concern about the reported activities of its student hostesses as the N.C.A.A.’s review of the recruiting practices of the university’s football program continued.
